Name: Kunal Kushwaha
Headline: Teaching millions how to code and helping businesses scale.
About: Kunal Kushwaha is the Field CTO at Civo, where he focuses on cloud-native technologies and AI, helping companies modernize their infrastructure and adopt innovative solutions.He is also the founder of WeMakeDevs, a community initiative where he mentors individuals in tech. His educational content on YouTube has been watched by millions.A passionate advocate for open source, Kunal regularly speaks at industry conferences on cloud, AI, and developer growth.Kunal Kushwaha is the Field CTO at Civo, where he focuses on cloud-native technologies and AI, helping companies modernize their infrastructure and adopt innovative solutions.
